img_above_text:
![Foothills Walkthrough \(111\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0a/Foothills_Walkthrough_%28111%29.png)
When its health has been knocked down past the halfway mark, it will start to dive into the water where you won't be able to reach it. It will move underneath the surface to try and dive up and attack you. Look for where the water is rippling to work out where it'll emerge.
img_below_text:
It will dive in and out a few times, then its huge tail will appear from the water to try and hit you. This will appear almost tentacle-like, and there can be overlap which means you're dodging more than one at once.
Thankfully, with a limited range of attacks and a fairly straightforward way to avoid them, Jiao-Loong of Waves shouldn't require too much to take it down. Don't feel the need to conserve your spells during this fight; take advantage of them to quickly take down this miniboss.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Foothills Walkthrough \(111\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0a/Foothills_Walkthrough_%28111%29.png)
When its health has been knocked down past the halfway mark, it will start to dive into the water where you won't be able to reach it. It will move underneath the surface to try and dive up and attack you. Look for where the water is rippling to work out where it'll emerge."
        - Following Text: "It will dive in and out a few times, then its huge tail will appear from the water to try and hit you. This will appear almost tentacle-like, and there can be overlap which means you're dodging more than one at once.
Thankfully, with a limited range of attacks and a fairly straightforward way to avoid them, Jiao-Loong of Waves shouldn't require too much to take it down. Don't feel the need to conserve your spells during this fight; take advantage of them to quickly take down this miniboss."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic encounter in *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing a player character wading through water while facing off against a large, reptilian miniboss, Jiao-Loong of Waves. The creature is perched on a rock, emphasizing its imposing size and aquatic nature. The surrounding environment features dense trees, cliffs, and a moody atmosphere, reinforcing the tension of the battle. This scene aligns with the walkthrough's description of the boss's behavior, including its water-based attacks and tail strikes, and serves as a visual representation of the fight's setting and dynamics.
